page.title: 04Brinklow's Woolridge Family
page.content: for school but situated next door,many a morning I'm knitting her plaits into shape as the school bell dongs its constant reminder of our lateness. Behind the closed door Kit and I survey the wreckage then I hear"Where are we going today mummy?Who's coming here today?"making me feel incredibly guilty if there's nothing in the offing.However it's my turn to provide lunch for a group of friends though that's not soon enough for Kit so he goes to play with Richard.By the time we have lunched and the children have managed to grind the last crisp into the carpet it's almost 3.30 and time for Jolan to return from school.Much to Kit's delight it's not a day for piano lessons,Brownies or Gymnastics. When the novelty of having his sister around wears off they're squabbling over who has the black fruit gum!
